mapper.select: SELECT a.emp_code, b.dep_name, a.name, c.assign_name, a.join_date, a.birth, a.gender, a.phone, a.address, a.email FROM employee a JOIN department b ON a.dep_code = b.dep_code JOIN assignment c ON a.assign_code = c.assign_code

SELECT a.emp_code, b.dep_name, b.dep_code , c.assign_code, c.assign_name, a.name, a.join_date, a.birth, a.gender, a.phone, a.address, a.email, a.id, a.password, a.mng_code, dc.dayoff_cnt, dc.remain_cnt FROM employee a JOIN department b ON a.dep_code = b.dep_code JOIN assignment c ON a.assign_code = c.assign_code JOIN dayoff_count dc ON a.emp_code = dc.emp_code WHERE a.emp_code = #{empCode} AND dc.create_date = ( SELECT MAX(dc2.create_date) FROM dayoff_count dc2 WHERE dc2.emp_code = a.emp_code)

SELECT a.emp_code b.dep_name c.assign_name a.name, a.join_date a.birth, a.gender, a.phone, a.address, a.email FROM employee a JOIN department b ON a.dep_code = b.dep_code JOIN assignment c ON a.assign_code = c.assign_code
WHERE 1=1
AND b.dep_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND a.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
